title: Sy Garte on Wolfram & Chaitin: Red Queen Principle v. Telos & Agency, Sacrifice, Love & Anomaly
description:
Sy Garte, author of The Works of His Hands, former atheist who became a Christian through his decades of work in biochemistry, now involved in origin of life studies. 

Sy and Karen discuss Stephen Wolfram's questions regarding the nature of life. Sy responds to Gregory Chaitin's forays into metabiology and Jordan Peterson's theory of sexual selection as the driver of evolution.

The Wolfram / Chaitin conversation, begin at 1:06:00. 
https://youtu.be/d8MWRkS1pek

Sy's life story from a previous episode of The Meaning Code:
https://youtu.be/_6dFPuubR1M

The Jordan Peterson/Ben Shapiro link, start at 1:03
https://youtu.be/c5CFoVsM9lg

Stephen Wolfram 10/19/21 update on his Theory of Everything:
https://youtu.be/Sr6CmIzF6u0
